rgb

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x30
Size:
0x4
Source:
output.rdl

Description

controls the brightness of the three color channels of an RGB LED

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:24] - - - -
[23:16] b rw 0x0 -
[15:8] g rw 0x0 -
[7:0] r rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

b

controls strength of color blue

g

controls strength of color green

r

controls strength of color red
